insight.title: Social Media Ad Performance Correlation with Weather Patterns
insight.summary: Analysis of Q1 2025 social media campaigns reveals a strong correlation between ad performance and local weather conditions. Click-through rates increased by 31% during rainy days in target regions, while conversion rates were 18% higher during periods of extreme temperatures (both hot and cold).
recommendations: Increase ad spend during forecasted rain for key regions
Develop creative variations specifically for extreme weather conditions
